official-title.#text:
To modify the definition of fiduciary under the Employee
		  Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exclude appraisers of employee stock
		  ownership plans.

committee-name.#text:
Committee
			 on Education and the Workforce

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) included in an employee stock ownership plan
			 (as defined in

Employee Retirement Income and Security Act of 1974/s:407/ss:d/p:6

quote.#text:
and except to the extent a person is providing
			 an appraisal or fairness opinion with respect to qualifying employer securities
			 (as defined in

Section 3(21)(A) of

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2041 IH: To modify the definition of fiduciary under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exclude appraisers of employee stock ownership plans.
